summary: A dispute between stage lines goes back and forth until one comes up with what it hopes will end it all .
cast: William Bishop|Kathleen Crowley|Richard Webb|Hugh Sanders|John Doucette|Frank Ferguson|Ray Teal|Percy Helton|Maudie Prickett|Robert Anderson|Leah Baird|Lane Bradford|John Cason|Russell Custer|Bob Folkerson|Byron Foulger|Coleman Francis|Slim Gaut|Frank Hagney|Carol Henry|George Huggins|Ann Kunde|Cherokee Landrum|John Lehman|Cactus Mack|Hank Mann|Kermit Maynard|Dennis Moore|Emil Sitka|Guy Teague|Al Thompson|Nick Thompson|Eddy Waller|Ruth Warren|Blackie Whiteford|Robert B. Williams
title: The Phantom Stagecoach
